Creates stripe oath url link

Args:
    db (Session, optional): db session injected. Defaults to Depends(get_db).
    current_organisation_id (int, optional): org id from token.
    Defaults to Security( auth_dao.get_current_organisation_id, scopes=["owner"] ).

Returns:
    Any: account link url

schema.title: Response Create Stripe Url Link Payment Method Stripe  Get

put.description:
Reauthorises a stripe access token

Args:
    payment_method_id (int): id of payment method to refresh
    db (Session, optional): db session. Defaults to Depends(get_db).
    current_organisation_id (int, optional): org id. Defaults to Security( auth_dao.get_current_organisation_id, scopes=["owner"] ).

Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 payment method not found
    HTTPException: Stripe oath error.

Returns:
    StripePaymentMethod | None: Payment Method with new access token

Deauthorises Stripe Account

Args:
    payment_method_id (int): id of payment method
    db (Session, optional): db sesson. Defaults to Depends(get_db).
    current_organisation_id (int, optional): org id.
    Defaults to Security( auth_dao.get_current_organisation_id, scopes=["owner"] ).

Returns:
    Any: Payment Method obj with no access token
